name: Olay Gentle Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover, Fragrance Free, 3.4 fl oz, Hydrating Face Cleanser Removes Makeup, Sunscreen and Oil
short_description: USED FOR: Removal of makeup, sunscreen, and oil
WORKS FOR: All skin types—oily, normal, combination, and dry
FEELS LIKE: A non-greasy and gentle cleanser
FORMULA: Free of fragrances
PAIRS WITH: Olay Cleansing Melts Daily Facial Cleanser and your favorite Olay Face Moisturizers
product_description: Wash away the day with Olay Gentle Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover. Easily remove your face and eye makeup, sunscreen, and excess oil with a cleansing balm that erases it all. It’s non-greasy and gentle—unlike other harsh makeup wipes that over-strip your skin. Walk away with your skin still feeling hydrated and ready for the rest of your routine. This fragrance-free formula leaves you feeling fresh and clean. CLEANSES: Removes your makeup, sunscreen, and oil FEELS GREAT: Non-greasy, gentle on skin, and fragrance-free PREPS YOUR SKIN: Primes your face for your next skin care or makeup step Meet your new makeup melting balm and watch the magic happen. Massage it into your skin to clean away the day’s extra buildup on your skin. This face cleanser is made to play nice with a cleansing formula that works for all skin types from oily to dry and from combination to normal—and gives you a clean slate for whatever your next skin care or makeup step may be. Directions: Use this as the first step in your routine. Apply to dry skin. Massage balm in a circular motion across your face with your fingertips, including over your closed eyes for eye makeup removal. Rinse with water or with a damp cloth. Can be used either morning or night.

product_description: Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe's Makeup Removing Cleanser Balm is a facial cleansing balm that combines the benefits of ceramides and plant-based jojoba oil. The formula is easy to rinse off and leaves no residue, suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin, making it perfect for stocking stuffers & a travel size makeup remover. • Paraben-free • Fragrance-free • Alcohol-free • Non-comedogenic • Allergy-tested • Suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin Key Ingredients: • Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier • Plant Based Jojoba Oil: Helps retain skin moisture as you cleanse, leaving your skin feeling nourished, soft and comforted long after cleansing.
